events.name: Wheels of Wonder
events.short_description: Gear up for Wheels of Wonder, a thrilling robot race where teams build their own bots and navigate through a challenging maze track, testing speed, strategy, and innovation at every turn.

events.name: Quest-e-carvaan
events.short_description: Embark on a mystical journey with our Treasure Hunt, where each clue leads your caravan deeper into the land of wonders, mystery, and discovery.

events.name: Hackathon
events.short_description: Join us for the Hackathon, where creativity meets technology. Collaborate with like-minded individuals to develop innovative solutions and bring your ideas to life.

events.name: Campus Starlight & Cosnova
events.short_description: Modeling and Cosplay competition where participants showcase their talents in fashion design, makeup artistry, and character portrayal, celebrating creativity and self-expression.

events.name: Rhythm Riot
events.short_description: Competition for group dance. Teams will compete in various dance styles, showcasing their choreography, synchronization, and stage presence to captivate the audience and judges alike.

events.name: Mic it Happen
events.short_description: Open mic event where participants can showcase their talents in music, poetry, comedy, and more, creating a vibrant platform for artistic expression and community engagement.
